science.subtitle: Authoritative Environmental Knowledge
science.description: Explore the latest environmental science research and data

hero.title: Scientific Environmental Protection
hero.subtitle: Guided by science, making environmental protection more effective

waterSaving.title: Water Conservation Tips
waterSaving.description: Vegetable washing water can water flowers, laundry water can mop floors. Multiple uses for every drop maximize water value.

wasteSorting.title: Waste Sorting Guide
wasteSorting.description: Proper waste classification not only reduces environmental pollution but also enables effective resource recycling.

energySaving.title: Energy Saving Tips
energySaving.description: Turn off lights, use energy-efficient appliances, choose public transport. Small actions, big impact.

greenTech.title: Green Technology: Sustainable Energy Solutions for Future Cities
greenTech.description: As global warming intensifies, how to integrate more green technology into urban development has become a key issue. This article explores the latest solar panel technology, wind energy utilization, and smart grid applications in modern cities...

oceanPlastic.title: Ocean Plastic Pollution: More Than Just a Straw Problem
oceanPlastic.description: Millions of tons of plastic waste flow into the ocean every year, threatening marine life. This in-depth report will help you understand the dangers of microplastics and the cleanup actions and plastic reduction policies being taken by countries...

evBattery.title: Electric Vehicles: Battery Recycling Knowledge You Need to Know
evBattery.description: With the popularity of electric vehicles, the disposal of waste batteries has become a new environmental challenge. If not handled properly, heavy metals in batteries will cause serious pollution. Learn about proper recycling channels and regeneration technology...

notifications.title: Message Center
notifications.subtitle: Replies and Interactions
notifications.description: View replies and interactions from other users on your content

contents.content1: I totally agree with your point! Environmental protection really needs to start with each person. I will pay more attention to energy saving and emission reduction in daily life. The tips you mentioned are very practical and I've started practicing them.
contents.content2: The waste sorting method you shared is very practical, I've bookmarked it! Hope to see more environmental tips like this.
contents.content3: I see that your sharing on environmental protection is very valuable, hope we can learn and exchange with each other!
contents.content4: Thank you for sharing such detailed energy-saving tips! I've started practicing them at home and the results are great.
contents.content5: Great environmental activity sharing! Hope to have the opportunity to participate in such activities.

originalContents.original1: Each of us should contribute to environmental protection, starting from daily small things, such as saving water, waste sorting, green travel, etc...
originalContents.original2: Waste Sorting Knowledge - Let Environmental Protection Start from Details
originalContents.original3: Home energy saving is actually very simple, such as using LED bulbs, turning off appliances in time, setting air conditioning temperature reasonably, etc...
originalContents.original4: Thoughts on Participating in Community Tree Planting Activities

randomContents.content1: Your environmental philosophy is great, learned a lot!
randomContents.content2: I've tried this method, it's really effective.
randomContents.content3: Thank you for sharing, very inspiring to me.
randomContents.content4: Hope to participate in more environmental activities with you.
randomContents.content5: Your sharing gave me a new understanding of environmental protection.
randomContents.content6: These tips are so practical, I've started practicing them.
randomContents.content7: I totally agree with your point, environmental protection needs everyone's effort.
randomContents.content8: Your experience sharing is very valuable, thank you!

cover.title: Low-Carbon Planner
cover.description: Build a sustainable future. Balance industrial growth with environmental protection through scientific decision-making, writing a green chapter in this innovation capital.
cover.footer: Shenzhen Low-Carbon Office Â© 2026 Based on Real City Data Simulation

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.subtitle: Shenzhen Low-Carbon Planner Game Guide

objective.title: Game Objective
objective.content: You will play as Shenzhen's low-carbon city planner. Within 15 rounds (each round = 1 year), balance four dimensions: "Industrial Development, Citizen Needs, Technological Innovation, and Ecological Protection" to achieve core goals:
objective.note: Unlock quality endings; meet specific conditions to achieve perfect endings.

deploy.title: Card Deployment
deploy.step1: Click on a card to view complete details (resource consumption, effects, carbon emission impact)
deploy.step2: If resources meet requirements, click "Deploy" to consume resources and activate. Once activated, the card will light up. Drag the card directly to the corresponding area to take effect

recycle.title: Card Recycling / Discarding
recycle.recycleDesc: Click the "Card Recycle" button at the bottom, then click any industrial card to convert it into 2 industrial value (circular economy mechanism)
recycle.discardDesc: Long press and drag the card to the screen edge, release and confirm

endTurn.title: End Turn
endTurn.step1: After deploying cards, click "Next Turn". The system will automatically settle this round's resources (continuous production / consumption)
endTurn.step2: After settlement, new cards for the next round will be dealt, and the progress bar will advance

tips.title: Key Tips
tips.tip1: Monitor carbon emission indicators every round to avoid exceeding limits
tips.tip2: Balance development across all four dimensions, don't over-focus on one aspect
tips.tip3: Make good use of the card recycling mechanism to convert unwanted cards into resources
tips.tip4: Technological innovation cards can unlock more efficient development paths
tips.tip5: Ecological protection investments have high short-term costs but significant long-term benefits

tutorial.ready: Ready to start your low-carbon planning journey?

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Help & Support
help.description: Welcome to YouthLoop Help Center! Here you'll find all the information and support you need. If you can't find the answer, please feel free to contact our customer service team.

register.q: How to register a YouthLoop account?
register.a: Click the 'Register' button in the top right corner of the homepage and fill in the necessary information to complete registration. You can also use third-party accounts for quick login.

password.q: What to do if I forget my password?
password.a: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your registered email, and we'll send a password reset link to your email.

profile.a: After logging in, go to 'Personal Center' and click 'Edit Profile' to modify your personal information.

register.q: How to register for environmental activities?
register.a: Browse the activity plaza, select activities you're interested in, click 'Register Now' and fill in relevant information.

cancel.a: Yes. You can cancel your registration in 'My Activities' up to 24 hours before the activity starts.

cancelled.q: What if an activity is cancelled?
cancelled.a: If an activity is cancelled for any reason, we will notify all registered users promptly and provide alternative activity options.

earn.a: Participate in environmental activities, complete daily check-ins, share environmental knowledge, invite friends, etc. can all earn point rewards.

use.a: Points can be used to redeem environmental gifts, participate in special activities, improve user level, etc.

expire.a: Points are valid for 2 years. Points that exceed the validity period will be automatically cleared.

moreHelp.title: Have other questions?
moreHelp.description: If you haven't found the answer you need, our customer service team is always here to help.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: YouthLoop (hereinafter referred to as 'we') attaches great importance to user privacy protection. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information. Using our services means you agree to the terms of this privacy policy.

activeInfo.title: 2.1 Information You Actively Provide
items: Registration information: username, password, email, phone number
Personal profile: nickname, avatar, gender, age, region
Activity participation: registration information, participation records, feedback
User-generated content: comments, shares, uploaded images and text

autoInfo.title: 2.2 Automatically Collected Information
items: Device information: device model, operating system, browser type
Usage data: access time, page browsing records, feature usage
Location information: IP address, approximate geographic location (only with your consent)
Information collected by cookies and similar technologies

infoUse.title: 3. Information Use Purposes
infoUse.description: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
items: Provide, maintain and improve our services
Process your registration and account management
Organize and manage environmental activities
Personalized content recommendations and user experience
Send service notifications and important updates
Prevent fraud and ensure platform security
Comply with legal and regulatory requirements
Conduct data analysis to improve service quality

infoSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
infoSharing.description: We do not sell, rent or trade your personal information. We only share your information in the following circumstances:
items: With your explicit consent
Share with service providers to support our service operations
Comply with laws and regulations, court orders or government requirements
Protect our or others' rights, property or safety
In case of business transfer or merger

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We take multiple security measures to protect your personal information:
items: Use SSL encryption to transmit sensitive data
Implement access control and authentication
Regular security audits and vulnerability scans
Employee privacy training and confidentiality agreements
Data backup and disaster recovery plans

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We only retain your personal information for the necessary period. The specific retention period depends on the type of information and purpose of use. When information is no longer needed, we will securely delete or anonymize it. You can request deletion of your account and related data at any time.

userRights.title: 7. Your Rights
userRights.description: Under applicable privacy laws, you have the following rights:
items: Access and view your personal information
Correct inaccurate or incomplete information
Delete your personal information
Restrict or object to information processing
Data portability rights
Withdraw consent (where processing is based on consent)

cookiePolicy.title: 8. Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze website usage and provide personalized content. You can manage cookie preferences through browser settings, but this may affect the normal use of certain features.

childrenPrivacy.title: 9. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are primarily for users aged 13 and above. If we discover that we have collected personal information from children under 13, we will immediately delete such information. If you are a parent or guardian and discover that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

policyUpdates.title: 10. Policy Updates
policyUpdates.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Significant changes will be notified through website notifications, email or other appropriate means. Continued use of our services indicates your acceptance of the updated policy.

contactUs.title: 11. Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or need to exercise your rights, please contact us:

info.address: Mailing Address: Environmental Building, Chaoyang District, Beijing, Privacy Protection Department

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms of Service
section1.content: Welcome to YouthLoop environmental platform! When you register, access or use our services, you agree to comply with all terms and conditions of this User Service Agreement.

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.content: YouthLoop is an online platform dedicated to environmental education and action. We provide environmental knowledge popularization, activity organization, user interaction and points reward services.

section3.title: 3. User Responsibilities
section3.content: Users need to provide accurate registration information, protect account security, and comply with platform usage standards.

section4.title: 4. Contact Us
section4.content: If you have any questions about this agreement, please contact us through the following methods:

contact.address: Address: Environmental Building, Chaoyang District, Beijing

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: YouthLoop (hereinafter referred to as 'we') attaches great importance to user privacy protection. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information. Using our services means you agree to the terms of this privacy policy.

section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
section2.content: We collect information you actively provide and automatically collected usage data to provide you with better services.

section3.title: 3. Purpose of Information Use
